We live our lives doing mundane stuff everyday. Its annoying how life always gets you, either at the expense of others or yourself. Either ways, people always try to fabricate how they really are with an image they would ideally be but usually everyone's true colours will show after time ah. No point ah brother. But then again, that's life. Oh how i would like a million things, and the most probable way is to get a rich girlfriend; to sustain my smoking habit, my addiction to torturing myself, ruining my body with ink and metal, my over-reliance on cabs. Most of all, i would love someone to be..more than someone you have sex with everyday ah. How should i put this. I can safely say I am getting laid more often than anyone i know of, but that is not really the point. I guess it would be nice to wake up to a familiar face on my bed, everytime i wake up. yup. Instead of yet another random. I'm not asking for a lot what. Just a rich, hot chick, coupled with some good conversational skills, similar interests and nothing that closely resembles my ex-girlfriend. Fuck okay, the shit she did, talking about it just pisses me off. I can safely say we are of a total different intellectual level. But that's life, i fell for her probably 'cause she was always there when i needed someone, and i got used to that. But that isn't love is it now. Well, we gave it a try and all i can say it was too close for comfort. So much for more than 2 lines eh bitch. hahah.

I fucking killed off all my contacts with girls for my ex-girlfriend, because of her insecurity issues, and for that i was not getting laid for a long while la. Ah fuck it, what's past is past.

On another note, I can't stand you. You are seriously as childish as we met 4 years ago. If you can't stand losing money, dont fucking gamble la. Not wrong at all. First it was evelyn who made me not want to hang out with qs all. Huh now you. I always thought aiya fuck it la dont have to talk to you or what but seriously it gets on my nerves too much ah. So much for being blood all. Your attitude clearly shows how materialistic you are, what with treating the rich like gods and the others as though they owed you money. Hopefully you wake up someday, be it in the hands of some fucker that you pissed off subconciously, because your eq is as low of that of an ass. As in nothing comes out of your orifice is good. But enough about that.

Hmmm.. What else can I can talk about. My friend's setting up this tee shirt selling thing. He seems pretty confifuck about it but i kind of get the feeling he think he has everything planned out but somehow something he missed out. Yes, that would be as close in words as i can say about what i think but okay ah, not wrong wish him all the best. And i get free shit too. hahaha.

Okay ah, thats a long entry. Suck my cock okay
